testcase.name: Verify User Role page › should be able to successfully display User role page
Verify User Role page › Should successfully search available permissions for Service Provider Level
Verify User Role page › Should successfully display list of roles, search bar, Create Role, Edit, Delete button on roles section page
Verify User Role page › Should successfully search roles by name and display "No results found" if not available
Verify User Role page › Should create a new role with all permissions and verify it exists
Edit Role - Verify Permissions Retention and Update › Should verify retained permissions and update role description and permissions

failure.message: TS_006_Verify_edit_role.spec.ts:49:7 Should verify retained permissions and update role description and permissions
